Pakar Bicara Sistem Anggaran Smart Dambaan Anies Baswedan
02 Nov 2019, 07:31 by Pasti Liberti Mappapa
Jakarta - Dicecar soal kejanggalan anggaran yang diusulkan sejumlah suku dinas dalam Rencana Kebijakan Umum Anggaran Prioritas Plafon Anggaran Sementara (KUA-PPAS) DKI Jakarta 2020, Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberi pembelaan. Dia justru menyudutkan sistem e-budgeting dengan menyebut sistem 'warisan' gubernur pendahulunya itu tidak cerdas.
"Jadi sistemnya sekarang ini sudah digital, but not a smart system. Itu hanya digital aja, mengandalkan orang untuk me-review. Itu sudah berjalan bertahun-tahun. Karena itu ini akan diubah, tidak akan dibiarkan begitu saja. Let's do it in a smart way," ujar Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Rabu (30/10/2019).
Menurut Anies, sistem yang digunakan dalam proses penganggaran harusnya bisa langsung memverifikasi atau mendeteksi anggaran yang janggal. Dengan algoritma tertentu, Anies yakin sistem tersebut bisa tercipta. "Begitu ada masalah langsung nyala. Red light. Begitu ada angka yang tidak masuk akal, langsung muncul warning. Kan bisa tahu," ujarnya.
"Ini tinggal dibuat algoritma aja, 'if' item-nya itu jenisnya Aibon, harganya Rp 82 miliar, sebenarnya harganya kan enggak semahal itu. Harganya Rp 20 ribu, Rp 30 ribu, terus totalnya mencapai puluhan miliar, pasti ada salah. Harusnya ditolak itu sama sistem."
text:
Anies Baswedan, an expert on smart budget system, longs for Anies
02 Nov 2019, 07:31 by Definitely Liberti Mappapa
Jakarta - Checked about the budget irregularities proposed by a number of service clans in the 2020 DKI Jakarta Provisional Budget Ceiling (KUA-PPAS) Public Policy Plans, DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a defense. He actually cornered the e-budgeting system by calling the 'inheritance' system of his predecessor governor not smart.
"So the system is now digital, but not a smart system. It's just digital, relying on people to review. It has been running for years. Because of this it will be changed, it will not be left alone. Let's do it in a smart way, "said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall, Wednesday (10/30/2019).
According to Anies, the system used in the budgeting process should be able to directly verify or detect an odd budget. With certain algorithms, Anies believes the system can be created. "As soon as there is a problem, it immediately starts. Red light. Once there is an unreasonable number, a warning immediately appears. You can know," he said.
"All that's left is to make an algorithm, if the item is of Aibon type, the price is Rp. 82 billion, actually the price is not that expensive. The price is Rp. 20 thousand, Rp. 30 thousand, then the total reaches tens of billions, there must be something wrong. it's the same system. "
